verses.verse: לְדָוִ֡ד <S%H1732><s%> [A Psalm] of David אֵלֶ֥יךָ <S%H413><s%> to יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Unto thee O LORD נַפְשִׁ֥י <S%H5315><s%> my soul אֶשָּֽׂא׃ <S%H5375><s%> do I lift up

אֱ‍ֽלֹהַ֗י <S%H430><s%> O my God בְּךָ֣ בָ֭טַחְתִּי <S%H982><s%> I trust אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not אֵב֑וֹשָׁה <S%H954><s%> in thee let me not be ashamed אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יַֽעַלְצ֖וּ <S%H5970><s%> triumph אֹיְבַ֣י <S%H341><s%> let not mine enemies לִֽי׃

גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> Indeed כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> who קֹ֭וֶיךָ <S%H6960><s%> Yea let none that wait לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יֵבֹ֑שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> on thee be ashamed יֵ֝בֹ֗שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> let them be ashamed הַבּוֹגְדִ֥ים <S%H898><s%> which transgress רֵיקָֽם׃ <S%H7387><s%> without cause
דְּרָכֶ֣יךָ <S%H1870><s%> me thy ways יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD הוֹדִיעֵ֑נִי <S%H3045><s%> Shew אֹ֖רְחוֹתֶ֣יךָ <S%H734><s%> me thy paths לַמְּדֵֽנִי׃ <S%H3925><s%> teach

הַדְרִ֘יכֵ֤נִי <S%H1869><s%> Lead בַאֲמִתֶּ֨ךָ ׀ <S%H571><s%> me in thy truth וְֽלַמְּדֵ֗נִי <S%H3925><s%> and teach כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַ֭תָּה <S%H859><s%> You אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> me for thou [art] the God יִשְׁעִ֑י <S%H3468><s%> of my salvation אוֹתְךָ֥ <S%H854><s%> for קִ֝וִּ֗יתִי <S%H6960><s%> on thee do I wait כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> all the day

זְכֹר־ <S%H2142><s%> Remember רַחֲמֶ֣יךָ <S%H7356><s%> thy tender mercies יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD וַחֲסָדֶ֑יךָ <S%H2617><s%> and thy lovingkindnesses כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for מֵעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> for they [have been] ever of old הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> like

חַטֹּ֤אות <S%H2403><s%> not the sins נְעוּרַ֨י ׀ <S%H5271><s%> of my youth וּפְשָׁעַ֗י <S%H6588><s%> nor my transgressions אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּ֫זְכֹּ֥ר <S%H2142><s%> Remember כְּחַסְדְּךָ֥ <S%H2617><s%> according to thy mercy זְכָר־ <S%H2142><s%> remember לִי־ אַ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> you לְמַ֖עַן <S%H4616><s%> sake טוּבְךָ֣ <S%H2898><s%> thou me for thy goodness' יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> sake O LORD

טוֹב־ <S%H2896><s%> Good וְיָשָׁ֥ר <S%H3477><s%> and upright יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> [is] the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> after that יוֹרֶ֖ה <S%H3384><s%> therefore will he teach חַטָּאִ֣ים <S%H2400><s%> sinners בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H1870><s%> in the way

יַדְרֵ֣ךְ <S%H1869><s%> will he guide עֲ֭נָוִים <S%H6035><s%> The meek בַּמִּשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> in judgment וִֽילַמֵּ֖ד <S%H3925><s%> will he teach עֲנָוִ֣ים <S%H6035><s%> and the meek דַּרְכּֽוֹ׃ <S%H1870><s%> his way

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אָרְח֣וֹת <S%H734><s%> All the paths יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD חֶ֣סֶד <S%H2617><s%> [are] mercy וֶאֱמֶ֑ת <S%H571><s%> and truth לְנֹצְרֵ֥י <S%H5341><s%> unto such as keep בְ֝רִית֗וֹ <S%H1285><s%> his covenant וְעֵדֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H5713><s%> and his testimonies

לְמַֽעַן־ <S%H4616><s%> sake שִׁמְךָ֥ <S%H8034><s%> For thy name's יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> sake O LORD וְֽסָלַחְתָּ֥ <S%H5545><s%> pardon לַ֝עֲוֹנִ֗י <S%H5771><s%> mine iniquity כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> for it [is] great הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> he הָ֭אִישׁ <S%H376><s%> What man יְרֵ֣א <S%H3373><s%> [is] he that feareth יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Jehovah י֝וֹרֶ֗נּוּ <S%H3384><s%> archer בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in the way יִבְחָֽר׃ <S%H977><s%> [that] he shall choose

נַ֭פְשׁוֹ <S%H5315><s%> His soul בְּט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> at ease תָּלִ֑ין <S%H3885><s%> shall dwell וְ֝זַרְע֗וֹ <S%H2233><s%> and his seed יִ֣ירַשׁ <S%H3423><s%> shall inherit אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the earth

ס֣וֹד <S%H5475><s%> The secret יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לִירֵאָ֑יו <S%H3373><s%> [is] with them that fear וּ֝בְרִית֗וֹ <S%H1285><s%> them his covenant לְהוֹדִיעָֽם׃ <S%H3045><s%> him and he will shew

עֵינַ֣י <S%H5869><s%> Mine eyes תָּ֭מִיד <S%H8548><s%> [are] ever אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> toward the LORD כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> He יוֹצִ֖יא <S%H3318><s%> for he shall pluck מֵרֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H7568><s%> out of the net רַגְלָֽי׃ <S%H7272><s%> my feet

פְּנֵה־ <S%H6437><s%> Turn אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me וְחָנֵּ֑נִי <S%H2603><s%> thee unto me and have mercy כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For יָחִ֖יד <S%H3173><s%> upon me for I [am] desolate וְעָנִ֣י <S%H6041><s%> and afflicted אָֽנִי׃ <S%H589><s%> I

צָר֣וֹת <S%H6869><s%> The troubles לְבָבִ֣י <S%H3824><s%> of my heart הִרְחִ֑יבוּ <S%H7337><s%> are enlarged מִ֝מְּצֽוּקוֹתַ֗י <S%H4691><s%> of my distresses הוֹצִיאֵֽנִי׃ <S%H3318><s%> [O] bring thou me out

רְאֵ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> Look עָ֭נְיִי <S%H6040><s%> upon mine affliction וַעֲמָלִ֑י <S%H5999><s%> and my pain וְ֝שָׂ֗א <S%H5375><s%> and forgive לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חַטֹּאותָֽי׃ <S%H2403><s%> all my sins

רְאֵֽה־ <S%H7200><s%> Consider אוֹיְבַ֥י <S%H341><s%> mine enemies כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for רָ֑בּוּ <S%H7231><s%> for they are many וְשִׂנְאַ֖ת <S%H8130><s%> and they hate חָמָ֣ס <S%H2555><s%> me with cruel שְׂנֵאֽוּנִי׃ <S%H8135><s%> hatred

שָׁמְרָ֣ה <S%H8104><s%> O keep נַ֭פְשִׁי <S%H5315><s%> my soul וְהַצִּילֵ֑נִי <S%H5337><s%> and deliver אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not אֵ֝ב֗וֹשׁ <S%H954><s%> me let me not be ashamed כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for חָסִ֥יתִי <S%H2620><s%> for I put my trust בָֽךְ׃
תֹּם־ <S%H8537><s%> Let integrity וָיֹ֥שֶׁר <S%H3476><s%> and uprightness יִצְּר֑וּנִי <S%H5341><s%> preserve כִּ֝֗י <S%H3588><s%> for קִוִּיתִֽיךָ׃ <S%H6960><s%> me for I wait
פְּדֵ֣ה <S%H6299><s%> Redeem אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> O God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel מִ֝כֹּ֗ל <S%H3605><s%> of all צָֽרוֹתָיו׃ <S%H6869><s%> out of all his troubles
